    • Method Detail

      • convertStreamToString

        public java.lang.String convertStreamToString(java.io.InputStream is)
        To convert the InputStream to String we use the Reader.read(char[] buffer) method. We iterate until the Reader return -1 which means there's no more data to read. We use the StringWriter class to produce the string.

      • readToEom

        public java.lang.String readToEom(java.io.DataInputStream rdr,
                         int eom)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Read the characters from a Reader into a String. Reads until receives the given end-of-message character, which it consumes without returning.
        Parameters:
        rdr - Reader to read; should be DataInputStream or equivalent for efficiency
        eom - end-of-message character; not returned with String result
        Returns:
        String with all characters from Reader
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
